languages.text: "После всего, что ты пережил{mf||а}... после всего, свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} чего ты был{mf||а}... ты соглашаешься с ней?" {n}Дознаватель умолкает и бросает взгляд на Эмелину.{/n} "Неважно. Я не позволю колдовству свершиться. Твой... функциональный реминисцентный блок подвел тебя".

"After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."
languages.original_text: "После всего, что ты пережил{mf||а}... после всего, свидетел{mf|ем|ьницей} чего ты был{mf||а}... ты соглашаешься с ней?" {n}Дознаватель умолкает и бросает взгляд на Эмелину.{/n} "Неважно. Я не позволю колдовству свершиться. Твой... функциональный реминисцентный блок подвел тебя".

I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你目睹了这一切……经历了这一切……而现在，你居然同意她的看法？”{n}海因里希沉默不语，看着艾米莉娜。{/n}“算了，不要紧。总之，我决不允许这种巫术行为。很显然，你的……记忆区块中的数据存在漏洞。”
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: “你目睹了这一切……经历了这一切……而现在，你居然同意她的看法？”{n}海因里希沉默不语，看着艾米莉娜。{/n}“算了，不要紧。总之，我决不允许这种巫术行为。很显然，你的……记忆区块中的数据存在漏洞。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Después de todo lo que ha sufrido... de todo lo que ha visto... ¿está de acuerdo con ella?». {n}Heinrix enmudece y mira a Emelina.{/n} «No importa. No toleraré esta hechicería. Me temo que su... bloque reminiscente operativo tiene lagunas en sus datos».
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: «Después de todo lo que ha sufrido... de todo lo que ha visto... ¿está de acuerdo con ella?». {n}Heinrix enmudece y mira a Emelina.{/n} «No importa. No toleraré esta hechicería. Me temo que su... bloque reminiscente operativo tiene lagunas en sus datos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これまであれだけのことに耐え…あれだけのことを目撃してきたというのに…陛下は彼女の意見に同意するのですか？」{n}ハインリックスは黙ってエメリナを見つめた。{/n}「どうでもいいのです。この魔術の実行は許可しません。あなたの…実行可能な回想ブロックには、明らかに複数のデータギャップがあります」
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: 「これまであれだけのことに耐え…あれだけのことを目撃してきたというのに…陛下は彼女の意見に同意するのですか？」{n}ハインリックスは黙ってエメリナを見つめた。{/n}「どうでもいいのです。この魔術の実行は許可しません。あなたの…実行可能な回想ブロックには、明らかに複数のデータギャップがあります」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Après tout ce que vous avez enduré... Après tout ce que vous avez vu... vous vous rangez à son avis ? » {n}Heinrix se tait un instant et regarde Emelina.{/n} « Peu importe. Je ne vous laisserai pas mener cette sorcellerie à bien. Votre... bloc mémoriel opérationnel est clairement défaillant. »
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: « Après tout ce que vous avez enduré... Après tout ce que vous avez vu... vous vous rangez à son avis ? » {n}Heinrix se tait un instant et regarde Emelina.{/n} « Peu importe. Je ne vous laisserai pas mener cette sorcellerie à bien. Votre... bloc mémoriel opérationnel est clairement défaillant. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nach allem, was Ihr durchgemacht habt ... nach allem, dessen {mf|Zeuge|Zeugin} Ihr wurdet ... stimmt Ihr ihr zu?" {n}Heinrix verstummt und sieht Emelina an.{/n} "Das spielt keine Rolle. Ich werde diese Hexerei nicht zulassen. Euer ... operationaler Erinnerungsblock hat offensichtlich Datenlücken."
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: "Nach allem, was Ihr durchgemacht habt ... nach allem, dessen {mf|Zeuge|Zeugin} Ihr wurdet ... stimmt Ihr ihr zu?" {n}Heinrix verstummt und sieht Emelina an.{/n} "Das spielt keine Rolle. Ich werde diese Hexerei nicht zulassen. Euer ... operationaler Erinnerungsblock hat offensichtlich Datenlücken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Katlandığın, şahit olduğun bunca şeyin ardından ondan yana mı saf tutuyorsun?" {n}Heinrix, sessizleşip Emelina'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Önemi yok. Bu sahirliğe müsaade etmeyeceğim. Operasyonel anı blokundaki verilerde birtakım boşluklar olduğu belli."
languages.original_text: "After everything you've endured... after everything you've witnessed... you're agreeing with her?" {n}Heinrix falls silent and looks at Emelina.{/n} "It doesn't matter. I won't allow this sorcery to happen. Your... operational reminiscence block clearly has some gaps in its data."

traits.locale_text: "Katlandığın bunca şeyin ardından, şahit olduğun bunca şeyin ardından, onun yanında mı yer alıyorsun?" {n}Heinrix sessizleşiyor ve Emelina'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Önemli değil. Bu sahirliğin gerçekleşmesine izin vermeyeceğim. Operasyonel anı blokundaki verilerde bazı boşluklar olduğu belli."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
